subject: Anfrage Bestellung
description_text:
Hallo, ich wollte mal fragen da ich Express versandt genommen habe wann das
Paket versendet wird.

Bestellnummer:
SSN5882

Liebe Grüße Zocher

Von Gmail Mobile gesendet

conversations.body_text: Hi Fluffybeard,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments have been impacted by heavy snowfall in Europe, with road blockages causing delivery delays to our warehouse. We will expedite delivery to the warehouse as soon as possible or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your goods from China.  We will compensate you based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hello thanks for the answer, but some information might have been good. I
would take some Haptic, no fun, but you don't pay for otherwise express
that it's there quickly.

Among other things, I also possibly a partner who accompanies my path as a
Simracer rookie to the experienced driver. Maybe you are interested :)


Von Gmail Mobile gesendet


service@simsonn.com

It's almost when I write the next day Thursday that means 6 days are over,
you get no information, you write to the service and even there you wait
longer than 24 hours. What kind of service is this? According to the order
it was said the delivery is within 3-7 delivery. How do you want to meet me
now? I'm really angry. Money has been deducted, the main thing is that the
money is there.


Great Day ??

Von Gmail Mobile gesendet


Fluffybeard <johannes.zocher93@googlemail.com> schrieb am Di. 13. Jan. 2026

Hi Fluffybeard,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We will ship your order from China in two separate packages and cover all associated taxes and fees.

Eine Information von der Sendungsnummer wäre Hilfreich man bekommt keine
Informationen hier.
